text: William O'Dwyer (July 11, 1890November 24, 1964) was an American politician. He was the 100th Mayor of New York City. He was mayor from January 1946 to August 1950.City of New York, William O'Dwyer, 100th Mayor, 1946â€”1950 (1890 - 1964) , retrieved November 23, 2013 ==References== ==Other websites== * O'Dwyer profile at the official New York City website Category:1890 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Mayors of New York City Category:District attorneys Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
